verses.text_plain: In thee, O Lord, do I put my trust; let me never be ashamed: deliver me in thy righteousness.
verses.verse_html: 1In thee, O Lord, do I put my trust; let me never be ashamed: deliver me in thy righteousness.

verses.text_plain: Bow down thine ear to me; deliver me speedily: be thou my strong rock, for an house of defence to save me.
verses.verse_html:
2Bow down thine ear to me; deliver me speedily: be thou my strong rock, for an house of defence to save me. ▼
▼ my…: Heb. to me for a rock of strength

footnotes.body_text: ▼ my…: Heb. to me for a rock of strength
footnotes.body_html: ▼ my…: Heb. to me for a rock of strength

verses.text_plain: For thou art my rock and my fortress; therefore for thy name’s sake lead me, and guide me.
verses.verse_html: 3For thou art my rock and my fortress; therefore for thy name’s sake lead me, and guide me.

verses.text_plain: Pull me out of the net that they have laid privily for me: for thou art my strength.
verses.verse_html: 4Pull me out of the net that they have laid privily for me: for thou art my strength.

verses.text_plain: Into thine hand I commit my spirit: thou hast redeemed me, O Lord God of truth.
verses.verse_html: 5Into thine hand I commit my spirit: thou hast redeemed me, O Lord God of truth.

verses.text_plain: I have hated them that regard lying vanities: but I trust in the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 6I have hated them that regard lying vanities: but I trust in the Lord.

verses.text_plain: I will be glad and rejoice in thy mercy: for thou hast considered my trouble; thou hast known my soul in adversities;
verses.verse_html: 7I will be glad and rejoice in thy mercy: for thou hast considered my trouble; thou hast known my soul in adversities;

verses.text_plain: And hast not shut me up into the hand of the enemy: thou hast set my feet in a large room.
verses.verse_html: 8And hast not shut me up into the hand of the enemy: thou hast set my feet in a large room.

tokens.text: And hast not shut me up

verses.text_plain: Have mercy upon me, O Lord, for I am in trouble: mine eye is consumed with grief, yea, my soul and my belly.
verses.verse_html: 9Have mercy upon me, O Lord, for I am in trouble: mine eye is consumed with grief, yea, my soul and my belly.

verses.text_plain: For my life is spent with grief, and my years with sighing: my strength faileth because of mine iniquity, and my bones are consumed.
verses.verse_html: 10For my life is spent with grief, and my years with sighing: my strength faileth because of mine iniquity, and my bones are consumed.

verses.text_plain: I was a reproach among all mine enemies, but especially among my neighbours, and a fear to mine acquaintance: they that did see me without fled from me.
verses.verse_html: 11I was a reproach among all mine enemies, but especially among my neighbours, and a fear to mine acquaintance: they that did see me without fled from me.

verses.text_plain: I am forgotten as a dead man out of mind: I am like a broken vessel.
verses.verse_html:
12I am forgotten as a dead man out of mind: I am like a broken vessel. ▼
▼ a broken…: Heb. a vessel that perisheth

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a broken…: Heb. a vessel that perisheth
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a broken…: Heb. a vessel that perisheth

verses.text_plain: For I have heard the slander of many: fear was on every side: while they took counsel together against me, they devised to take away my life.
verses.verse_html: 13For I have heard the slander of many: fear was on every side: while they took counsel together against me, they devised to take away my life.

verses.text_plain: But I trusted in thee, O Lord: I said, Thou art my God.
verses.verse_html: 14But I trusted in thee, O Lord: I said, Thou art my God.

verses.text_plain: My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.
verses.verse_html: 15My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.

verses.text_plain: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant: save me for thy mercies’ sake.
verses.verse_html: 16Make thy face to shine upon thy servant: save me for thy mercies’ sake.

verses.text_plain: Let me not be ashamed, O Lord; for I have called upon thee: let the wicked be ashamed, and let them be silent in the grave.
verses.verse_html:
17Let me not be ashamed, O Lord; for I have called upon thee: let the wicked be ashamed, and let them be silent in the grave. ▼
▼ silent…: or, cut off for

footnotes.body_html: ▼ silent…: or, cut off for

verses.text_plain: Let the lying lips be put to silence; which speak grievous things proudly and contemptuously against the righteous.
verses.verse_html:
18Let the lying lips be put to silence; which speak grievous things proudly and contemptuously against the righteous. ▼
▼ grievous…: Heb. a hard thing

footnotes.body_html: ▼ grievous…: Heb. a hard thing

verses.text_plain: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!
verses.verse_html: 19Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt hide them in the secret of thy presence from the pride of man: thou shalt keep them secretly in a pavilion from the strife of tongues.
verses.verse_html: 20Thou shalt hide them in the secret of thy presence from the pride of man: thou shalt keep them secretly in a pavilion from the strife of tongues.

verses.text_plain: Blessed be the Lord: for he hath shewed me his marvellous kindness in a strong city.
verses.verse_html:
21Blessed be the Lord: for he hath shewed me his marvellous kindness in a strong city. ▼
▼ strong: or, fenced

tokens.text: for he hath shewed me his marvellous

verses.text_plain: For I said in my haste, I am cut off from before thine eyes: nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 22For I said in my haste, I am cut off from before thine eyes: nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee.

verses.text_plain: O love the Lord, all ye his saints: for the Lord preserveth the faithful, and plentifully rewardeth the proud doer.
verses.verse_html: 23O love the Lord, all ye his saints: for the Lord preserveth the faithful, and plentifully rewardeth the proud doer.

verses.text_plain: Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 24Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the Lord.
